Title: Relates to licensed home care services agencies; repealer
Summary: Repeals provisions requiring authorization for a licensed home care services agency to enroll as a provider under the medical assistance program.
LawCode: Rpld ยง3605-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 3605-c of the public health law requiring authorization for a licensed home care services agency to enroll as a provider under the medical assistance program
